title: How to give meaning to a so called history - Quora

response.answer_text: History? Music? The world? History is something that has happened in the past. Whether good or bad! In music it was The Beatles who made Music History in the 60’s. The wars, WWI, WWII, Vietnam, Spanish American war, Korean War, Middle East war, etc. all made History. You study History in school or college. History could be one’s family. Natanallity, religion, country of birth, etc. is History. The past. Also the moon landing made History. There’s a lot of History out there. Another example; the Civil Rights Movement back in the 50’s and 60’s. The Gay Rights movement in the 60’s. Women’s Rights to vote in 1920. The History of the U.S. The immigrants, Native Americans, etc. Elections. If you need more info, check out Google or visit your local library and check out books on History. Or visit states and cities in the U.S. for America’s History.
